website_summaries.verdict: The LG Phoenix 2 is an affordable prepaid AT&T phone with good performance and the latest Android software.

customer_reviews.title: If Something Says Unlocked It Should Be
customer_reviews.text: The phone is nice but was not unlocked at all. If I knew if was not going to be unlocked, I would have gotten something else. This is being used overseas and now I will have to pay more to have it unlocked. Thanks for that. Ridiculous
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars

customer_reviews.title: The cellphones are great both came LOCKED and in the page of AT&T ...
customer_reviews.text: I buy two of this phones as a gift (one for my parents and the other for my daughter). The cellphones are great both came LOCKED and in the page of AT&T (where they came from) denied the unlock codes because it must be used with their prepaid service at least 6 months. So if I don't send to a store to unlock in a illegal way you will have two little tablet intead a cellphones. Thank you seller, e@World, for cheat people.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: I bought this article and it come blocked, I ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this article and it come blocked, I had to pay too much money to return. See the response from AT&T portal "We can’t unlock this device because it hasn’t been active for at least six months of paid service."
customer_reviews.author: Carlos González

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice phone and I generally like it. I didn't give it five stars because I didn't too fancy the design of the volume buttons, though I like the placement of it at the back instead of at the side. Update : after using two of them I can truly say that I would not recommend this phone. The phone is slow, the camera is slow and doesn't take out quality pictures, it takes too long to charge, it has the look and feel of a low quality item. I definitely won't be buying another one.

customer_reviews.title: ... this for about an year now and it works fine. My biggest criticism is that the pictures at ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for about an year now and it works fine. My biggest criticism is that the pictures at night or with the lights on indoors are really bad. Also, mine was AT&T's, so I had to change some configuration on my phone for sharing internet and to open my contacts without getting the AT&T message.

product_meta.title: Unlocked LG Phoenix 2, 16GB, 4G LTE, 5" HD Screen, 8MP/5MP, Android 6.0
product_meta.description: Brand new GSM UNLOCKED world phone from cricket. Please follow the instruction on package to unlock the phone Phone is UNLOCKED for international GSM networks use including North / South / Central America, Africa, Asia, Europe. Phone can NOT be used for CDMA services like verizon, boost mobile, virgin mobile,ect
feature_bullets: GSM 850/900/1800/1900 MHz, UMTS 850/1900/2100, LTE Bands 2/4/5/12/29 (Not CDMA CARRIERS Sprint Verizon Virgin and more)
16gb Storage (9.7 GB User) Support Up to 32gb micro sd / 1.5 Gb Ram
8mp Flash LED + 5Mp Front Camera Take 4 selfies on a timer.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars120 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
